content: your holiday decor will look very unique with these adorable christmas snowflake ornaments this crochet motif is very easy and quick to make follow the free instructions and create a bunch of these snowflakes they are not only great for decorating your christmas tree or adorn the windows but also perfect to give as gifts these snowflakes are crocheted with cotton thread size 8 and a crochet hook 1 75 mm and they measure 9 cm 3 5 inches in diameter you can change the size of your snowflakes by using different yarn weights and hook sizes
